thread.title: Enterprise Inns' chairman buys new shares
thread.title_full: Enterprise Inns' chairman buys new shares

title: Enterprise Inns' chairman buys new shares
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Fri, Jul 24, 2015, 02:39 BST - UK Markets open in 5 hrs 21 mins Enterprise Inns' chairman buys new shares By Jessica Fino | Sharecast – 9 hours ago 23.95 -1.29 
LONDON (ShareCast) - (ShareCast News) - Enterprise Inns (LSE: ETI.L - news ) 's chairman Robert Walker purchased new shares in the company one day after Numis upgraded the stock as it expects the new strategy to enhance the level and quality of earnings from 2017. Walker bought 160,000 shares at the British leased and tenanted pub company for an individual price of 123.5p, spending a total of £197,600. 
Following the transaction, the chairman holds 435,000 shares in the company, which represent 0.09% of its issued shares. 
Numis said on Wednesday the group's new strategy should have a "substantial long-term impact on its earnings composition, even if the impact on earnings is likely to be limited over the next two years". 
Read more: Numis ups Enterprise Inns to 'buy'; says new strategy will enhance earnings Top Director Buys Enterprise Inns (ETI (Shenzhen: 002005.SZ - news ) ) Director name: Mr Robert M Walker Amount purchased: 160,000 @ 123.50p Value: £197,600 Burberry Group (Other OTC: BBRYF - news ) (BRBY) Director name: Mr John Smith Amount purchased: 11,938 @ 1,585.53p Value: £189,281 BlackRock Income Strategies Trust (BIST) Director name: Miss Lynn Ruddick Amount purchased: 45,800 @ 136.90p Value: £62,700 Murray International Trust (MYI) Director name: Mr James Douglas Best Amount purchased: 5,000 @ 912.00p Value: £45,600 Aukett Swanke Group (AUK (KSE: 017900.KS - news ) ) Director name: Mr John Bullough Amount purchased: 500,000 @ 7.25p Value: £36,250 Top Director Sells Datatec Ltd.
